name: Lake Masters Pro: Nihon Juudan Kuromasu Kikou
overview: Lake Masters Pro is the third game (and the latest one) in the fishing game series for the Playstation One console that features 18 lakes (with 130 fishing points) and these game modes: - Travel - Free fishing - Lure trade The player can fish in these lakes: Hachirogata, Tarumizu Dam, Hibarako, Kitaura, Kasumigaura, Ushikunuma, Kagawuchiko, Ashinoko, Norijiko, Irukaike, Biwako Honko, Biwako Nanko, Ikehara Dam, Ikunoginzanko, Hakuryuko, Sameura Dam, Ongagawa or Hokuzan Dam.
